name: Anonymous Impostors
descriptionEN: Impostors are anonymous to each other. Therefore impostors can accidentally kill each other. (two commands : /anonymous on|off and /soloimpostors on|off)
author: Wunax

name: Better Polus
descriptionEN: An Among Us mod that tweaks Polus, allowing a more balanced experience
author: Brybry16

name: Chameleon
descriptionEN: The chameleon has the possibility to become invisible for a certain period of time
author: Wunax

name: Cultist
descriptionEN: The cultist mod
author: Aeolic

name: Custom Key Binds
descriptionEN: Allows to customise your keybinds in settings
author: Herysia

name: Crowded
descriptionEN: Adds the ability to play with more than 10 players (you need an Impostor server for now)
author: CrowdedMods

name: Custom Roles
descriptionEN: Combines 3 custom roles : The Torch, The Mayor and The Sweeper
author: tomozbot

name: Dictator
descriptionEN: The Dictator vote counts as 8 votes
author: DillyzThe1

name: Extra Roles
descriptionEN: Combines 4 extra roles : The officier, The Joker, The Engineer and The Medic
author: NotHunter101

name: Love couple
descriptionEN: The primary objective of the Love Couple is to stay alive together. If they are among the last 3 players they win. Each lover can win as an Impostor or Crewmate as well.
author: Woodi-dev

name: Mayor
descriptionEN: The mayor vote counts as 2 players
author: tomozbot

name: More colors
descriptionEN: Adds 9 colors to the game
author: Snowad14

name: Sheriff
descriptionEN: The Sheriff is able to kill Impostors. If they shoot a Crewmate, they will lose their life instead.
author: Brybry16

name: Stop Time
descriptionEN: This gamemode adds a new button to The Impostor's HUD that allows them to stop time for a certain amount of time.
author: DillyzThe1

name: Sweeper
descriptionEN: The Sweeper is a crewmate that can vent
author: tomozbot

name: TooManyRoles
descriptionEN: The Too Many Roles Mod, is a mod for among Us, adding roles and perssonalization options. 15 options are configurable in the lobby. And currently has 3 roles : TimeMaster, Investigator and Lighter.
author: Hardel-DW

name: Torch
descriptionEN: The Torch has full vision, even when the lights are out
author: tomozbot

name: Town Of Impostors
descriptionEN: Town Of Impostors Mod is an Among Us modification for Windows. This mod aims to add new classes and abilities to the game to enhance the gameplay.
author: AJMix

name: Town Of Us
descriptionEN: An Among Us mod that adds a lot of mods and relevant game settings. There are 10 roles : Mayor, Jester, Sheriff, Lovers, Mafia, Godfather, Janitor, Mafioso, Engineer,Swapper, Shifter, Investigator, Time Master
author: slushiegoose

name: Tryhard
descriptionEN: Among us mod that fixes some game breaking bugs when tryharding among us. As well as some useful settings
author: Herysia

name: Vent Digger
descriptionEN: Impostors can dig their own vent network
author: ZiadMontaser

name: [CheepYT] Anonymous
descriptionEN: Allows to play on CheepYT custom server with Anonymous role
author: CheepYT

name: [CheepYT] Battle Royal
descriptionEN: Allows to play on CheepYT custom server with Battle Royal mod
author: CheepYT

name: [CheepYT] Cleaner
descriptionEN: Allows to play on CheepYT custom server with Cleaner role
author: CheepYT

name: [CheepYT] Color Swap
descriptionEN: Allows to play on CheepYT custom server with Color Swap mod
author: CheepYT

name: [CheepYT] Confusion
descriptionEN: Allows to play on CheepYT custom server with Confusion mod
author: CheepYT

name: [CheepYT] Infinite Kill Distance
descriptionEN: Allows to play on CheepYT custom server with Infinite Kill Distance mod
author: CheepYT

name: [CheepYT] Invisibility
descriptionEN: Allows to play on CheepYT custom server with Invisibility mod
author: CheepYT

name: [CheepYT] Jester
descriptionEN: Allows to play on CheepYT custom server with Jester role
author: CheepYT

name: [CheepYT] Quantum Tunneling
descriptionEN: Allows to play on CheepYT custom server with Quantum Tunneling mod
author: CheepYT

name: [CheepYT] Teleportation
descriptionEN: Allows to play on CheepYT custom server with Teleportation mod
author: CheepYT

name: Skeld.net
descriptionEN: Allows to play on Skeld.net custom server with many mods
author: Skeld.net
